rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;d26f83d4.1503">   <title>Examinations Officer role profile </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;d26f83d4.1503</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues<br><br>Within your institutions, I would be interested to know if you have a senior or management role of an examinations officer or similar, one that holds institutional accountability for examinations and assessment board management.<br><br>If you do have a similar role, I would be very grateful if you were able to share the role profile please. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-10T20:03:13+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Debbie Brearley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;d26f83d4.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;16d20795.1503">   <title>Re: 10 quick questions regarding invigilation and access arrangements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;16d20795.1503</link>   <description> Hi Caroline<br>Aston University response below<br>Lesley<br><br>Lesley Wood<br>Examinations Officer<br>[Description: http://static.aston.ac.uk/emails/sigs/purple.gif]<br>Registry<br>Aston Triangle<br>Birmingham, B4 7ET, UK<br>Telephone +44(0)121 204 4662<br>l.m.wood@aston.ac.uk &lt;mailto:l.m.wood@aston.ac.uk&gt;<br><br>From: ARC Assessment Practitioners Group [mailto:ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Caroline Taylor<br>Sent: 09 March 2015 12:22<br>To: ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: 10 quick questions regarding invigilation and access arrangements<br><br>Dear Colleagues<br><br>At the University of Bedfordshire we are currently reviewing our processes around invigilation scheduling and timetabling of students with access arrangements. We schedule up to 700 invigilator slots in our busiest exam period and 400 students with access arrangements. This work is completed following the [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-10T12:05:42+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Wood, Lesley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;16d20795.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;12c1440a.1503">   <title>London location needed for Aston University exams </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;12c1440a.1503</link>   <description> Dear colleagues<br>One of our distance learning courses are looking for somewhere in London to facilitate exams on 17 July (AM and PM) and also for 27-28 August (AM/PM to be confirmed).<br>They have approximately 30 students expected to attend these exams.<br><br>Do any of my London based colleagues host external exams or if not, could recommend any reputable centres that would be suitable?<br>Please send responses to Agnes Varadi a.varadi@aston.ac.uk&lt;mailto:a.varadi@aston.ac.uk&gt;, Professional Engineering Administrator, Aston Professional Engineering Centre, School of Engineering &amp; Applied Science. 0121 204 3453.<br>Many thanks<br>Lesley. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-10T11:52:11+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Wood, Lesley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;12c1440a.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;25ff04b8.1503">   <title>Re: 10 quick questions regarding invigilation and access arrangements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;25ff04b8.1503</link>   <description> Hi,<br><br>Here is the response from Kingston University.<br><br>Best wishes<br>Steph<br><br>Stephanie Hart| Exams Officer| River House| 53 - 57 High Street| Kingston Upon Thames| KT1 1LQ|<br>0208 417 3041<br><br>1. How many weeks in advance of an exam period do you publish the timetable? - exams start in mid-April and we publish the timetable in the last week of January [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T16:48:33+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Hart, Stephanie</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;25ff04b8.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;83ac2f80.1503">   <title>Re: 10 quick questions regarding invigilation and access arrangements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;83ac2f80.1503</link>   <description> Hi Caroline<br><br>Northumbria University below.<br><br>Cheers, Ben<br><br>Ben Ferry<br>Examinations Manager, Academic Registry<br><br>[cid:image002.jpg@01D05A86.37641DD0]&lt;http://www.northumbria.ac.uk/&gt;T: +44 (0)191 227 4056<br>F: +44 (0)191 227 3009<br>E: ben.ferry@northumbria.ac.uk&lt;mailto:ben.ferry@northumbria.ac.uk&gt;<br><br>ET007, Ellison Terrace, Northumbria University, Newcastle upon Tyne, NE1 8ST, United Kingdom<br><br>From: ARC Assessment Practitioners Group [mailto:ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Caroline Taylor<br>Sent: 09 March 2015 12:22<br>To: ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: 10 quick questions regarding invigilation and access arrangements [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T16:29:29+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Ben Ferry</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;83ac2f80.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;c501989e.1503">   <title>Re: option module choices for the next academic session </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;c501989e.1503</link>   <description> At University of Westminster module registration for continuing UG students opens on 24th March and closes on 16th April.<br>New UG &amp; PG students have until the end of the first week of teaching to choose Semester 1 modules and a mid-November deadline to choose Semester 2 options.<br><br>Kind regards<br><br>Melanie Hutton<br>Faculty Registry Manager<br>Westminster Business School&lt;http://www.westminster.ac.uk/about-us/schools/business&gt;<br>35 Marylebone Road<br>London<br>NW1 5LS [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T16:18:20+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Melanie Hutton</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;c501989e.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;a1eb275f.1503">   <title>Re: Double marking </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;a1eb275f.1503</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>Thank you for the replies to my questions on double marking below. Attached is an anonymised table of replies. The second sheet lists links I was sent \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd not in the same order as the institutions on the first page to maintain anonymity, though we all know how difficult that can be in assessment at times. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T16:02:43+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>WELHAM Sara</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;a1eb275f.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;132dc0e2.1503">   <title>Re: option module choices for the next academic session </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;132dc0e2.1503</link>   <description> Here at UEA our continuing students do their option choices online in March/April for the next academic session. New and Postgraduate students do their choices in September, although we try to have first year UG programmes compulsory, so there is no need to choose modules. There is also the opportunity for returning students to change their minds in the first two weeks of Semester, which is a large workload on admin staff. I would be very interested in a summary of practice across the sector, as now so much is online, I wonder if we could do the enrolment later [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T14:55:03+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Caroline Sauverin (LTS)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;132dc0e2.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;91cc08db.1503">   <title>Re: 10 quick questions regarding invigilation and access arrangements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;91cc08db.1503</link>   <description> Replies from Surrey below<br><br>Miv Fagg<br>Senior Assistant Registrar<br>Assessment &amp; Awards<br>University of Surrey<br>Guildford<br>GU2 7XH<br>T: +44(0)1483 689031<br>F: +44(0)1483 683811<br>From: ARC Assessment Practitioners Group [mailto:ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Caroline Taylor<br>Sent: 09 March 2015 12:22<br>To: ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: 10 quick questions regarding invigilation and access arrangements<br><br>Dear Colleagues<br><br>At the University of Bedfordshire we are currently reviewing our processes around invigilation scheduling and timetabling of students with access arrangements. We schedule up to 700 invigilator slots in our busiest exam period and 400 students with access arrangements. This work is completed following the publication of [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T13:49:33+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Miv Fagg</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;91cc08db.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;7e3224f9.1503">   <title>Re: option module choices for the next academic session </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;7e3224f9.1503</link>   <description> Hello<br>Here at Surrey students make option choices at the end of May for the next academic year, PG students doing so in September. Students still have two weeks at the start of each semester to change their minds and opt for something else.<br>Kind regards<br><br>Miv Fagg<br>Senior Assistant Registrar<br>Assessment &amp; Awards<br>University of Surrey<br>Guildford<br>GU2 7XH<br>T: +44(0)1483 689031<br>F: +44(0)1483 683811<br>From: ARC Assessment Practitioners Group [mailto:ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Helene Devane<br>Sent: 09 March 2015 12:12<br>To: ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: option module choices for the next academic session [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T13:42:16+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Miv Fagg</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;7e3224f9.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;d85814c0.1503">   <title>Re: option module choices for the next academic session </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;d85814c0.1503</link>   <description> At Northumbria our online option facility for continuing students has been open since 16 February and closes on 13 March. All options must be selected by 20 March.<br><br>Thanks<br>Melinda<br><br>Melinda Cook<br>Assistant Director / Deputy Academic Registrar<br><br>[cid:image003.jpg@01D05A65.BA4A4290]&lt;http://www.northumbria.ac.uk/&gt;T: +44 (0)191 227 4578<br>F: +44 (0)191 227 3009<br>E: melinda.cook@northumbria.ac.uk&lt;mailto:melinda.cook@northumbria.ac.uk&gt;<br><br>Room 106, Ellison Terrace, Northumbria University, Newcastle upon Tyne, NE1 8ST, United Kingdom [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T12:36:55+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Melinda Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;d85814c0.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;90728840.1503">   <title>Re: option module choices for the next academic session </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;90728840.1503</link>   <description> HI joe/Helen<br>Here at Leeds Trinity UG students are selecting options now for the next two weeks,<br><br>thanks<br><br>Sarah Mumby<br>Student Records and Assessment Officer<br>Student Administration<br>Leeds Trinity University<br>Brownberrie Lane<br>Horsforth<br>Leeds<br>LS18 5HD<br><br>Tel: 0113 2837326<br>Fax: 0113 2837200<br>Email: studentadmin@leedstrinity.ac.uk&lt;mailto:studentadmin@leedstrinity.ac.uk&gt;<br>www.leedstrinity.ac.uk&lt;http://www.leedstrinity.ac.uk/&gt;<br><br>[ZA102637861]&lt;https://www.facebook.com/#!/pages/LTU-Student-Admin/323759117791432&gt;<br><br>Normal working hours: Monday to Thursday 8.15 - 6pm<br><br>From: ARC Assessment Practitioners Group [mailto:ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Helene Devane<br>Sent: 09 March 2015 12:12<br>To: ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: option module choices for the next academic session [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T12:21:43+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sarah Mumby</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;90728840.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;c94242c0.1503">   <title>10 quick questions regarding invigilation and access arrangements </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;c94242c0.1503</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues<br><br>At the University of Bedfordshire we are currently reviewing our processes around invigilation scheduling and timetabling of students with access arrangements. We schedule up to 700 invigilator slots in our busiest exam period and 400 students with access arrangements. This work is completed following the publication of the exam timetable which is normally 4 weeks prior to an exam period. We use a mixture of professional and academic invigilators and the majority of this work is completed by the Assessment Department. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T12:21:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Caroline Taylor</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;c94242c0.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;733b1b2b.1503">   <title>Re: option module choices for the next academic session </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;733b1b2b.1503</link>   <description> Helene<br><br>Here at UWS, although students might give a provisional list of modules to the academic School by the end of May, the actual recording of the module selection isn't made until the students re-enrol the following September. All new students also make their module choices when enrolling on-line in September. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T12:18:10+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Anne Rogerson</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;733b1b2b.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;e328cb8d.1503">   <title>Re: option module choices for the next academic session </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;e328cb8d.1503</link>   <description> Dear Helene<br><br>Here at Liverpool Hope, Undergraduate continuing students are asked to make<br>their selections during March/April. Postgraduates select theirs in<br>September.<br><br>Best wishes<br><br>Paula<br><br>Paula Kelly<br>Records &amp; Assessments Manager<br>Student Administration<br>kellyp@hope.ac.uk<br>Tel: 0151 291 3840<br><br>Liverpool Hope University has<br><br>-<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd 92.8% of students in employment or further study six months after<br>graduation in 2013 (www.hesa.ac.uk/pis, July 2014, Table E1a)<br><br>\ufffd\ufffd Over \ufffd\ufffd50 million invested in buildings and equipment over the period<br>2007 to 2013 (University Financial Statements, hope.ac.uk/aboutus/finance<br>) [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T12:16:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Paula Kelly</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;e328cb8d.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;9f1ac130.1503">   <title>Re: option module choices for the next academic session </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;9f1ac130.1503</link>   <description> Dear Helene<br><br>At Goldsmiths our continuing students do their option choices online in March for the next academic session. New and Postgraduate students do their choices in September<br><br>Regards<br><br>Ms Kim Boxall<br>Interim Head of Assessments<br>Goldsmiths College<br>New Cross<br>London<br>SE14 6NW<br><br>From: ARC Assessment Practitioners Group [mailto:ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of Helene Devane<br>Sent: 09 March 2015 12:12<br>To: ARC-APG@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: option module choices for the next academic session [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T12:13:55+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kim Boxall</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;9f1ac130.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;2f6d2ab6.1503">   <title>option module choices for the next academic session </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;2f6d2ab6.1503</link>   <description> Dear APG colleagues<br><br>Please see the query below from Joe Taylor at Warwick University:<br><br>&quot;by when in the academic year are your students required to make their option module choices for the next academic session?&quot;<br><br>&lt;https://bradford.onlinesurveys.ac.uk/examination-services-provided-away-from-home-university&gt;Thank you,<br><br>Kind regards,<br><br>Helene Devane<br><br>APG Secretary<br><br>Assistant Registrar Policy Unit<br><br>Registry<br><br>h.devane@coventry.ac.uk&lt;mailto:h.devane@coventry.ac.uk&gt;<br><br>02477657089<br><br>Mobile: 07974984823<br><br>For all Policy Unit related issues ie. regulations, reviews and appeals, complaints, policy, please use policy.reg@coventry.ac.uk&lt;mailto:policy.reg@coventry.ac.uk&gt;    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T12:11:32+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Helene Devane</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;2f6d2ab6.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;52b52bbe.1503">   <title>Re: Where is your Assessment/Exam Team Based? </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;52b52bbe.1503</link>   <description> Dear Helen<br><br>The exams office itself is not student facing and therefore we do not have any issues with security of exam papers. For students that need to speak to a member of the assessment team they make an appointment or queue in our Unihelp area (student counter) where members of the assessment team are available on a rotational basis. These meetings are conducted in individual private pods. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-05T17:05:29+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Joanne Moles</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;52b52bbe.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;d4170ae5.1503">   <title>Where is your Assessment/Exam Team Based? </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;d4170ae5.1503</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>I would be grateful if you could let me know whether your Assessment/Exams team are based in a student facing office?<br><br>* If so how do you deal with confidentiality issues such as exam paper security, speaking to students about results without having others overhear? Dealing with Extenuating Circumstances and Appeals confidential information? [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-05T15:29:00+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Helen Haines</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;d4170ae5.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;aebf8e26.1503">   <title>Re: Student reference requests </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;aebf8e26.1503</link>   <description> Hi Anne<br><br>At Middlesex we have a central email for third party verification requests (i.e recruitment agencies) and these requests are dealt with by our colleagues at our call centre, QuScient, but overseen by the certificates department of the Academic Registry. They confirm dates and awards and we charge \ufffd\ufffd20 for these. For direct employers there is no charge. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-04T16:37:22+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Emma MacLaren</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;aebf8e26.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;635c7f2.1503">   <title>Double marking </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;635c7f2.1503</link>   <description> Dear Assessment Practitioners,<br><br>I am hoping that you can help me by answering the following questions. As usual, I am happy to collate and circulate anonymised replies.<br><br>1 Do you require double marking of all taught student work?<br><br>2 If not, do you require some work to be double marked, e.g. if it is more than a specific number of credits, or is a dissertation? [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-04T08:24:08+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>WELHAM Sara</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;635c7f2.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;23542409.1503">   <title>Friday's APG Meeting </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;23542409.1503</link>   <description> Dear Assessment Practitioners<br><br>If you would like to attend Friday's meeting, and haven't yet signed up via<br>the ARC website, I'd be grateful if you could sign up by 3.00pm tomorrow<br>[Wednesday], please, so that numbers can be finalised for catering purposes.<br><br>I looks forward to seeing many of you on Friday.<br><br>Best wishes<br><br>Neil<br><br>--<br>Neil McLaughlin Cook CPsychol AFBPsS<br>Registrar<br>Liverpool Hope University<br>Hope Park<br>Liverpool<br>L16 9JD<br>tel: 0151 291 3473<br>email: mclauga@hope.ac.uk [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-03T11:57:52+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Neil McLaughlin-Cook</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARC-APG;23542409.1503</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
